statement:

are numbered from 1 to from top to bottom and the columns are numbered
from 1 to from left to right. A matrix cell on the intersection of the
-th row and the -th column can be represented as . Formally, a submatrix
of matrix is a group of four integers . We will assume that the

cells it contains.
